intro: Elatostema zhenyuanense, commonly known as the Zhenyuan Elatostema, is a species of flowering plant in the family Urticaceae. It is native to China, specifically the Zhenyuan region in Guizhou Province. The plant is characterized by its small, heart-shaped leaves and clusters of tiny, greenish-white flowers. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forest understories. Due to its limited distribution and specific habitat requirements, it is considered a rare and potentially endangered species.
